title: Predictive Model-Based Instructional Design Strategies for Enhancing Teachers' Imaginative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: A mobile-accessible microlearning environment for in-service math teachers. Emphasis on practical application through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of personality traits (extraversion, openness, etc.) and psychological factors on instructional design, and utilize an imagination competency diagnostic model
Develop at least three creative instructional design strategies through a structural approach based on predictive modeling
Submit project-based improvement plans for mathematics instruction incorporating self-efficacy and intrinsic motivation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
